NATIONAL INTEGRATED MATERNAL AND PERINATAL CARE GUIDELINES FOR SOUTH AFRICA 
105 
 
 
 
Assessment of antenatal patients at PHC clinics, community health centres and district hospitals 
• Ensure that a detailed history and examination of the patient is performed at first presentation. (Take a detailed 
history of the presence of risk factors of pre-eclampsia).
